modifier.dreamtinker.realsweep.descripti: A easier and much supreme sweep attack; If level larger than 1, the modifiers on the weapon would be trigger as well
modifier.dreamtinker.strong_heavy.descri: if user not have speed/strength, or on a moving live entity, weakness is applied; Otherwise weakness is removed
modifier.dreamtinker.strong_explode.flav: High-yield strike detected. Hope you brought your helmet!
modifier.dreamtinker.strong_explode.desc: Multiply tool damage based on modifier level
modifier.dreamtinker.echoed_attack.flavo: The Deep Dark will bury you.
modifier.dreamtinker.echoed_attack.descr: deal a follow-up attack on melee, or double damage on ranged; When triggered, echo energy is gathered and would trigger a sonic beam
modifier.dreamtinker.echoed_defence.flav: Warden: I do not think I have such ability
modifier.dreamtinker.glacial_river.descr: in exchange of HP, deal extra damage
modifier.dreamtinker.broken_vessel.descr: Boost max HP in exchange of......
modifier.dreamtinker.ouroboric_hourglass: Reduce damage, especially to the large number, but......
modifier.dreamtinker.ewige_widerkunft.fl: Unterlasse es, zu sagen: „Verweile doch, du bist so schön!“
modifier.dreamtinker.ewige_widerkunft.de: Every break make this weapon stronger
modifier.dreamtinker.burning_in_vain.des: Set self in fire,but strength the tool and gain ability to summon
modifier.dreamtinker.the_wolf_wonder.fla:
Verily, though we walk in the path of righteousness, yet shall the wolf come and question us.
 And we can do naught but return unto him the selfsame question.
modifier.dreamtinker.the_wolf_answer.fla: The answer is a reference to......
modifier.dreamtinker.the_wolf_answer.des: By pass (almost) all shield and resistance; and boost damage by effects number
modifier.dreamtinker.the_wolf_was.flavor: It had died; it was transfigured; and behold, it is become a wolf.
modifier.dreamtinker.the_wolf_was.descri: When tool lose durability, it store count and would improve other materials in the tool
modifier.dreamtinker.as_one.flavor: Only antimony harbors its radiance in silence; only through descent does the path of rebirth emerge.
modifier.dreamtinker.as_one.description: Gain ability to reduce damage, resist death and clear effects and fly
modifier.dreamtinker.two_headed_seven.de: teleport when hit block;boost damage when hit entity
item.dreamtinker.tntarrow.description: a consumable, special melee weapon.range less than exploding range！
item.dreamtinker.masu.description: Composing poetry while wielding a spear—truly a hero of his time!----a special heave spear that slow and sweep. Need to ride something or with strength effect otherwise apply weakness to self
tooltip.nigrescence_antimony.desc1: Void-Antimony, Corruptum Antimonii,Antimony of the First Death......Names so manifold it doth bear
tooltip.nigrescence_antimony.desc2: And lo, the means of its grasping are but simple.
tooltip.star_regulus.desc1: This is no true Magnum Opus—yet its essence quivers on the threshold of that sacred transmutation.
tooltip.star_regulus.desc2: By the arcane forge of Tinker’s Construct, through eldritch craft and secret rites, thou hast summoned them into being.
fluid.dreamtinker.molten_echo_shard.flui: Molten echo have high base damage, and make entities darkness
fluid.dreamtinker.molten_nigrescence_ant: Molten Nigrescence of Antimony deal damage to entity
Molten albedo stibium give night vision
fluid.dreamtinker.molten_lupi_antimony.f: This extremely dangerous fluid would lead everything deconstruct
fluid.dreamtinker.molten_ascending_antim: Molten Ascending Antimony can provide strength and mine blocks
Liquid Smoky Antimony can heal entities
adv.dreamtinker.eat_star_regulus.title: Magnum Opus
